title: GreenLife Countertop Toaster Oven Air Fryer Stainless Steel, Healthy Ceramic Nonstick, PFAS and PFOA-Free, Tray & Basket, Bake, Broil, Reheat, Adjustable Temp & Time Control, Auto Shutoff, Turquoise
description: The GreenLife Air Fry Toaster Oven maximizes space to deliver incredible results. The compact design features dual heating elements that ensure your food cooks evenly. The adjustable time and temperature control makes it simple to find your desired setting. Plus, the healthy ceramic nonstick baking pan is PFAS-free so you can make every meal without worrying about toxins. The spacious design allows for 4 slices of bread, a 9” pizza, a batch of cookies, and so much more.
